特記事項: 【合併】English Professional Writing A（総合政策学部）/英語プロフェッショナル・ライティングＡ（総合政策学部）
授業方法:
This course will be taught face-to-face. The format consists of: weekly preparation assignments, mini lectures, group discussions, peer and instructor feedback sessions, individual and group presentations, and IELTS writing and speaking tasks.

NOTE 1: This course is intended to improve students’ academic English skills. Therefore, all materials, instruction,
communications, and assignments are in English. Students are expected to only use English.

NOTE 2: This class is very demanding, involving a lot of reading, weekly preparation, and writing assignments. Class attendance, thorough preparation, and active class participation are expected.

トピック.授業計画1:
*All 14 sessions are planned for face-to-face format.
Some class time will involve the use of reading assignments and preparation tasks for discussion, formulating responses to articles, and planning for written responses, which will be submitted as course writing assignments. Some class time will involve student presentations of assigned and self-selected research articles. Some class time will involve peer and instructor feedback sessions on writing assignments and revision planning. A more detailed schedule will be distributed in the first class.
トピック.授業外学習2:
Student preparation outside of class meetings includes:
(1) Completely weekly assignments,
(2) Carefully reading academic articles and completing preparation tasks,
(3) Preparation for leading and participating in discussions,
(4) Conducting literature research on assigned and self-selected topics,
(5) Preparation for academic presentations, and
(6) Writing, using peer and instructor feedback, and revising drafts.
